response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, and we believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors. Considering its unique attributes and the benefits it offers, we propose to sell it to you at a special price of $950,000. We are confident this offer represents a fair valuation and an excellent opportunity for both parties. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
